unrealistic_events.title: A sketchy opportunity
unrealistic_events.description: A shady figure dressed in a trench coat approaches your {target} at a signature event and asks them to come see something in private. Your player looks to you for approval.
unrealistic_events.impact: Go with him and the shady figure to see what he has?

options.impact: You and your player go with the shady figure to see what he has. He opens a breifcase and offers the player a series of syringes.

options.description: Red syringe: The elixir of Immediate Gratification
options.impact: Your player sacrifices their youth for an immediate boost. Permanently gains +1 to every stat and +2 to his age.

options.description: Blue syringe: The elixir of Envy
options.impact: Your player must trade their dev trait with another starter on the team. The other player must not be older than them.

options.description: Green syringe: The elixir of Youth
options.impact: Your player trades their development for a return to youth. Downgrade the players dev trait to normal and remove -1 from age for every level of dev trait they lose. If at the end of the season this player gains a dev trait it must be reset to normal.

options.description: Oh no thank you sir, I dont do drugs.
options.impact: Your player gets nominated to speak at a school assembly for DARE. They miss the next game.

options.description: Call security and have the shady figure escorted out of the event.
options.impact: The figure is escorted out of the event. I wonder what that was about.
